headers.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https: http:; media-src 'self' data: blob:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; connect-src 'self' http://localhost:3001 https://api.hasivu.com https://www.google-analytics.com wss:; worker-src 'self' blob:; manifest-src 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests

data.name: Dessert
data.description: Sweet treats to end your meal on a delightful note

data.name: Curry
data.description: Traditional South Indian curries rich in flavor and nutrition

data.name: Lunch
data.description: Complete meal options with rice, dal, and vegetables for growing students

data.name: Breakfast
data.description: Nutritious South Indian breakfast options to start the day right

data.description: Healthy and tasty snacks for evening hunger pangs

data.name: Side
data.description: Perfect accompaniments to complete your meal
